body: Hentai logic: they are about the same age, but as one grew up splendidly (and in all the good places) the other is still the same fucking shota
God yes tentacle in butt yea
From childhood to young adults, they make it work.
I saw a pink scylla nurse on the cover and i was like ooooooh yeaaaaa
Very good though could be longer
Its weird that technically a guy in his 20s still look like a shota

Jeez... Scylla =/= Squid Girl, folks. Scylla (are supposed to) have eight tentacles. That may or may not be the case in this work, as I have yet to read it at this point. (If the girls in this manga have ten tentacles, then it's on the artist themself although Whether they have eight or ten, tentacled girls are awesome, of course, but attention to detail can sometimes be just as important as the smut factor of the content. Even if the sex is sloppy, that doesn't mean we should let our tags be that way, too. Better information, better hentai. Papa Nippon's.
